queries: SELECT name, salary FROM employees WHERE salary > 3000
SELECT department, AVG(salary) as avg_salary FROM employees GROUP BY department
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY salary DESC LIMIT 3
INSERT INTO employees (name, age, salary, department, city) VALUES ('Yeni İşçi', 25, 2000, 'IT', 'Baku')
INSERT INTO products (name, price, category, stock) VALUES ('Yeni Məhsul', 99.99, 'Electronics', 50)
UPDATE employees SET salary = salary * 1.1 WHERE department = 'IT'
UPDATE products SET price = price * 0.9 WHERE category = 'Electronics'
CREATE TABLE test_table (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT NOT NULL, value REAL)
CREATE TABLE users (user_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, username TEXT UNIQUE, password TEXT, created_date DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
ALTER TABLE employees ADD COLUMN address TEXT
ALTER TABLE products ADD COLUMN weight REAL
